head.supplied: ¶ [with reference to the complaint of the Lessee of the Richmond Punt in regard to the traffic over the Botanic Gardens Bridge] ¶ M's letter was forwarded to the Commissioner of Roads and Bridges on ...

div.p: No. 11131, vol. 1860 Q, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is an index entry only, of a letter dated 12 December 1860.
On 10 December the Commissioner of Roads and Bridges wrote to Heales a 'further letter relative to closing the Botanical Gardens Bridge' (No. 11099, vol. 1860 P, VPRS 1168, Public Records Office, Victoria). This letter was referred to M on 12 December 'for report'.
[with reference to the complaint of the Lessee of the Richmond Punt in regard to the traffic over the Botanic Gardens Bridge]
M's letter was forwarded to the Commissioner of Roads and Bridges on 15 December 1860.
